title: PropertyGuru
description: Worked on growing, improving, and maintaining Asia's largest online property portal.
statements: Developed core features by translating Figma designs into styled-components and Next.js.
Augmented a gating feature by designing an algorithm that masks website URLs using RegEx.
Operated in a biweekly cycle of sprint plannings and agile methodologies.
Tested components and features by writing unit tests in Jest.
Enforced development security by enforcing a pre-push git hook using Husky.

title: Mumbo Solutions
description: Worked on an e-commerce app for a wholesaler to manage and sell products online.
statements: Developed a full-stack shopping cart system in React, e-GHL Payments Gateway, Node.js, and Supabase (PostgreSQL).
Authenticated users using React-Router and Supabase Auth API.
Supported photo uploads using Supabase Storage API (Amazon s3 Storage).
Notified users via Email using Courier Notification API.

title: Expedia Group
description: Implemented designs for Expedia's flagship product, a travel agency & metasearch engine, that serves millions of flight passengers daily.
statements: Developed core checkout experience features by translating Figma designs into React.
Accelerated development workflow by integrating Github Actions into the CI/CD pipeline.

title: DataChat
description: Worked on an AI Data Analytics chatbot for enterprises to oversee and forecast their data.
statements: Developed a business intelligence dashboard using React, Redux and Plotly.
Displayed up-to-date data by automating an analytical data pipeline in React and Python.
Established end-to-end tests in Cypress for CI/CD completeness.
Led a team of 5 engineers to introduce a step-by-step tutorial to onboard new users.
Reviewed pull requests and managed individual deadlines to ensure project delivery.
Created a chart library with pie charts, bar charts, and OpenStreet maps in React and Plotly.
Implemented create, read, update, and delete (CRUD) endpoints in Go for managing users.
Developed a UI wizard for managing users in React, Redux, and Material Table.
